channel.title: RuneKeep
channel.description:
[CENTER] [B][SIZE=6]RuneKeep[/SIZE][/B]
Hello and welcome to my new server, this server is a Dodian server, however it will be filled with my own content after awhile. I have decide to rewrite majority of the source, I have gotten combat done, Mage, Range and melee are now more realistic. Although I have not done a lot with the forums because we are just temporarily using them until I get paid. I am looking for a well experienced person to be our web developer, this server will start out as a dodian remake but you will see major updates within the first few weeks of the server.
[b]Note:[/b] This is mostly to test out my new combat system, report bugs on the forums. I have removed every skill because I plan to rewrite them.
I will be working on skills today, hopefully I will have 5 skills done by tonight. The home area will be changed by this weekend. This server is mostly to bring back the Dodian feeling but in a better way and much faster, cleaner server!
[URL=http://"http://rs2007.org"]Forums[/URL]
[b]Server Features[/b] Dodian Feeling Server Great Community Thieving 100% Melee 100% Mage 100% Range Special Attacks Sounds - Weapon sounds, range sounds, some mage sounds.
If you are interested in the development please PM me your skype and we will talk!
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/11b1c0g.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/23wslcw.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/j8nvjt.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2u7p1qv.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/116jn7o.jpg[/img]
[/CENTER]

[CENTER]
[SIZE=6]RuneKeep[/SIZE]

Hello and welcome to my new server, this server is a Dodian server, however it will be filled with my own content after awhile. I have decide to rewrite majority of the source, I have gotten combat done, Mage, Range and melee are now more realistic. Although I have not done a lot with the forums because we are just temporarily using them until I get paid. I am looking for a well experienced person to be our web developer, this server will start out as a dodian remake but you will see major updates within the first few weeks of the server.

Note: This is mostly to test out my new combat system, report bugs on the forums. I have removed every skill because I plan to rewrite them.

I will be working on skills today, hopefully I will have 5 skills done by tonight. The home area will be changed by this weekend. This server is mostly to bring back the Dodian feeling but in a better way and much faster, cleaner server!
